statements.sql: select * from `payment_gateways` where (`type` = 'MANUAL') and `slug` = 'remittance-gateway' and `id` = 6 limit 1
select * from `payment_gateway_currencies` where `payment_gateway_currencies`.`payment_gateway_id` in (6) order by `id` desc
select * from `user_kyc_data` where `user_kyc_data`.`user_id` = 1 and `user_kyc_data`.`user_id` is not null limit 1
select * from `payment_gateway_currencies` where `payment_gateway_currencies`.`payment_gateway_id` in (6) order by `id` desc
select column_name as `column_name` from information_schema.columns where table_schema = 'xremit_pro_v2' and table_name = 'user_notifications'

insert into `user_notifications` (`user_id`, `message`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values (1, '\"Your Remittance  (Payable amount: 7.75,\r\n                    Get Amount: 567.51) Successfully Sended.\"', '2023-10-21 09:45:26', '2023-10-21 09:45:26')
bindings: "Your Remittance  (Payable amount: 7.75,\r\n                    Get Amount: 567.51) Successfully Sended."

statements.sql: insert into `transactions` (`user_id`, `payment_gateway_currency_id`, `type`, `remittance_data`, `trx_id`, `request_amount`, `exchange_rate`, `payable`, `fees`, `convert_amount`, `will_get_amount`, `remark`, `details`, `status`, `attribute`, `created_at`) values (1, 30, 'Remittance Gateway', '{\"type\":\"Bank Transfer\",\"sender_name\":\"Test User\",\"sender_email\":\"user@appdevs.net\",\"sender_currency\":\"CAD\",\"receiver_currency\":\"BDT\",\"sender_ex_rate\":1,\"sender_base_rate\":1.36,\"receiver_ex_rate\":81.07352941176471,\"first_name\":\"Paulo\",\"middle_name\":\"Androw\",\"last_name\":\"Dybala\",\"email\":\"dybala@gmail.com\",\"country\":\"Nigeria\",\"city\":\"Kuda\",\"state\":\"Bond\",\"address\":\"Central\",\"zip_code\":\"254\",\"phone\":\"1245214\",\"method_name\":\"Access Bank Plc\",\"account_number\":\"741025896321\",\"document_type\":\"NID\",\"sending_purpose\":\"Relative\",\"source\":\"Job\",\"currency\":{\"name\":\"ADPay USD\",\"code\":\"USD\"},\"send_money\":7,\"convert_amount\":7,\"remark\":null}', 'R98020225', 7, '1.0000000000000000', 8.5, 1.5, 7, 567.51470588235, 'ADPay', 'COMPLETED', 1, 'SEND', '2023-10-21 09:45:26')
